cards.title: Your health and wellbeing
Your family and finances
Your working environment
Your learning and development

values.text: We're focused on getting the important stuff done first. We don't get bogged down, we find solutions (they're out there!).
values.title: #MakeItHappen

values.text: We always put the whole company first - when we succeed collectively, we all succeed individually. Everyone has a voice, we listen to each other's opinions.
values.title: #1Team1Dream

values.text: The only constant is change: we embrace change and learn. We ask and listen for feedback, and always provide it too.
values.title: #AlwaysBeLearning

people.name: Dandan Shi
people.quote: We use predictive models and data analysis to drive decisions. The work we do is used quickly and by every team at MarketFinance. It’s really rewarding because you can actually see the impact that you’re having on the business.

people.name: Mike Gray
people.quote: I enjoy being part of a small, multi-disciplinary team. We tackle a variety of design problems; from creating tools for internal stakeholders to external products and services, delivering the best value to our customers.

people.name: Robyn Schuleman
people.quote: I feel proud coming into work every day knowing that we're all genuinely trying to do the best by our customers. We're here to help businesses do the things that really matter to them. That's a simple, but very powerful, mission!

people.name: Chris Findlow
people.quote: Our people are our biggest asset, and one of the best things about working here. The team is made up of bright and talented people from an impressive variety of backgrounds.

people.name: Mason L'amy
people.quote: We have a great culture here that's rooted in action. We can make decisions quickly to continuously adapt and drive our technology with best practices.

people.name: Avani Painter
people.quote: It’s been extremely energising working with so many different stakeholders who are all aiming to find a solution that enhances our customers’ experience. The continuous focus on improvements and innovation means that no two days are ever the same.
